column4: i've tried configure iptables with sudo iptables -t nat -i eth1 -A PREROUTING -p tcp -d 192.168.0.100 --dport 88 -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.2:80, but telnet 192.168.0.100 88 failed :(
because it's a private address range.
- how should i do a vnc port fwd to another pc?
are you trying to do it over the internet  ?
is it on the same 192.168 network
show me the rule again please.
- sudo iptables -t nat -i eth1 -A PREROUTING -p tcp -d 192.168.0.100 --dport 88 -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.2:80
88 is yoru source port 80 is your desintation
- still fail :( sudo iptables -t nat -i eth1 -A PREROUTING -p tcp -d 192.168.0.100 --sport 88 -j DNAT --to 192.168.0.2 --dport 80
pop into #netfilter and people will help you work it through
- how do i redo my iptables? i tried flush, but when i run iptables-save, i still see my entry
